value.name: Pistons’ Sekou Doumbouya lands at No. 9 in ESPN 2019 redraft
value.description: The three went over the top 14 picks in the 2019 draft and a number of players were bumped from their original positions. One of those players was Detroit Pistons forward Sekou Doumbouya, who Schmitz redrafted six spots higher to the Washington Wizards with the ninth pick. The Wizards originally drafted power forward Rui Hachimura of Gonzaga wi ...

value.name: Pistons Owner Tom Gores Donates 100K Masks to Detroit's COVID-19 Relief Effort
value.description: Detroit Pistons owner Tom Gores has bought 100,000 PPE face masks to be distributed to and used by the people of Detroit during the COVID-19 pandemic, the team announced on Monday. "The surgical-grade masks will be provided to Detroit police officers, firefighters, bus drivers and other city workers serving the public in order to help slow ...

value.name: Detroit Pistons owner Tom Gores donating 100,000 masks to first responders, city employees
value.description: Detroit Pistons owner Tom Gores, as part of a long-term relief package, has purchased 100,000 masks for employees and first responders in the city

value.name: Pistons’ owner Tom Gores buys 100,000 surgical masks for City of Detroit
value.description: Detroit Pistons owner Tom Gores has purchased 100,000 PPE masks for deployment and use by the City of Detroit. The surgical-grade masks will be provided to Detroit police officers, firefighters, bus drivers and other city workers serving the public in order to help slow the spread of COVID-19. “First responders and city workers are on the ...

value.name: How Does The Detroit Pistons’ Young Core Stack Up?
value.description: The Detroit Pistons have been bereft of an inspiring youth movement for a long time now. Do they finally have the young core they've been looking for?

value.name: Pistons Twitter Bracket Challenge: Rasheed Wallace Region
value.description: We’re going to unveil the bracket one region at a time, and next up is the Rasheed Wallace Region. The No. 1 seed is the owner of the hashtag made for Twitter Rod Beard and his #StartWriting campaign.

value.name: Detroit Pistons deliver 15K PPEs to Henry Ford Health System from Cleveland
value.description: (WXYZ) — The Detroit Pistons drove one of their trucks to Cleveland this week to help pick up thousands of pieces of PPE to help Detroit fight the COVID-19 pandemic. According to the team, the Cleveland Clinic had 15,000 pieces of PPE, ICU gowns that could be donated to doctors in Detroit. Related: Cleveland Clinic sending healthcare workers ...

value.name: Detroit Pistons owner Tom Gores donates 100,000 surgical-grade masks to first responders: 'They need our support'
value.description: Detroit Pistons’ owner Tom Gores is donating 100,000 surgical-grade masks to first responders and city workers to “help slow the spread” of coronavirus, the team announced Monday.
